me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.teleport

Interface QueuedTeleport<D>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - The class of the destination type appropriate to this teleportation.

    public interface QueuedTeleport<D>
    A type representing a queued player teleportation.
    Author:
    Glen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancel this queued teleport, if not cancelled already.
      D getDestination()
      Gets the target of this teleportation.
      Player getEntity()
      Gets the Player who is to be teleported.
      int getRemainingDelay()
      Gets the remaining time, in seconds, of the teleportation delay.
      boolean isCancelled()
      Determines if this queued teleportation is cancelled.
      void registerOnTeleport(java.lang.Runnable delegate)
      Registers code to run after a successful teleport.
      void registerOnTeleportCancel(java.lang.Runnable delegate)
      Registers code to run if a teleport is cancelled.

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Cancel this queued teleport, if not cancelled already. This method is expected not to notify the user automatically.

      • getDestination

        D getDestination()
        Gets the target of this teleportation.
        Returns:
        An instance representing the destination of this teleport.

      • getEntity

        Player getEntity()
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Gets the Player who is to be teleported.
        Returns:
        The Player who is to be teleported after the delay.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the teleportation is cancelled when this method is called.

      • getRemainingDelay

        int getRemainingDelay()
        Gets the remaining time, in seconds, of the teleportation delay.
        Returns:
        The remaining time, in seconds, after which teleportation will commence.

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Determines if this queued teleportation is cancelled. This method will also return true if the teleportation has successfully completed.

      • registerOnTeleport

        void registerOnTeleport(java.lang.Runnable delegate)
        Registers code to run after a successful teleport.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The code to run.

      • registerOnTeleportCancel

        void registerOnTeleportCancel(java.lang.Runnable delegate)
        Registers code to run if a teleport is cancelled.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The code to run.
